attributes.action: NO to another referendum & withhold British Democracy We Voted to leave EU
attributes.additional_details: A public outcry and shame to the politicians wanting the people of the United Kingdom to shamefully vote again as they don’t like the outcome of the current Brexit plan. Expecting the people to Remain against the public vote. Shameful on democracy and shameful to the British nation.
attributes.background: Stop another referendum as the British people have already voted to leave the EU. How can we expect to have faith in politicians if they want the people of the United Kingdom tonvote again, as the politicians clearly didn’t like the outcome.
